trans-unit.source: Provides data for column-related events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.

DataGridViewColumnEventArgs provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDataPropertyNameChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDefaultCellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerWidthChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderCellChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnMinimumWidthChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnNameChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnSortModeChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnToolTipTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnWidthChanged>
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnEventArgs"></xref> class.
The column that the event occurs for.
Gets the column that the event occurs for.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> that the event occurs for.
